column1: Any information available about the progress of Morocco opening back up?
Too early to determine. When there is news it will be posted on the 'Covid-19 Master Thread' at https://www.tripadvisor.co.uk/ShowTopic-g293â€¦Edited: 5:02 pm, May 27, 2020
Interesting you say it is early. Most of the world seems to be in some stage of opening, or at least publicly discussing options.Edited: 5:23 pm, May 27, 2020

Most people expected Morocco would start to ease lockdown at the end of Ramadan (which finished last weekend) but instead the government announced an extension until June 10thSo I assume we will hear something about plans to open up again in first week of June.
I watch the country of Panama. They remain locked tight but are now talking. Men can go out 2 hours a day 3 times a week and the women same on opposite days.
